data.name: Jorge Trad
data.profile: I am a software developer and am excited to apply my Frontend knowledge with Javascript and React in order to provide users with a more user-friendly experience and interaction with web applications. I have a wide disposition for teamwork and I care about meeting times and goals. I also have the facility to learn self-taught, which has allowed me to stay updated and learn about technologies necessary for web development.

certificates.description: Platzi English Academy will improve your four language skills, your listening, speaking, reading and writing.
certificates.name: English School Training Program

certificates.description: The achieved English level is 57/100 on the EF SET score scale and B2 Upper Intermediate according to the Common European Framework of Reference (CEFR). The EF SET score is calculated as an average of the reading and listening scores.
certificates.name: EF SET English Certificate 57/100 (B2 Upper Intermediate)

certificates.description: Learn to work with git, basic concepts, clone a repository and manage your projects by hosting them in your local repository and on GitHub.
certificates.name: Git and GitHub Professional Course

certificates.description: Master the basics of HTML and CSS. Define the architecture of your code and build a website using static components. Model the main screens of your website. Add responsive design and use preprocessors to optimize your CSS code.
certificates.name: Frontend Developer Course

certificates.description: Understand how the DOM works. Create plugins that give more functionalities to the video player. Implement events in an object according to the needs of your project.
certificates.name: Professional JavaScript Course

certificates.description: Configure a Testing environment with Jest, Implement unit tests, Configure Watch and Coverage in your project and Create Mocks for test suites.
certificates.name: Unit Testing Course with Jest in React

certificates.description: Learn from creating and designing components to fetching data from an API. Develop very high quality web applications in record time with React.js
certificates.name: React.js Course

certificates.description: Master the use of loaders and plugins to integrate your favorite tools into a development or production environment. Optimize your projects with file compression and minification. Configure Webpack with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, images and fonts.
certificates.name: Webpack Course

certificates.description: Learn all about HTML tags, semantics, CSS, how to style your website elements, EM / REM measurements, box model and much more.
certificates.name: Definitive Course of HTML and CSS

academic.description: Platzi is a 100% online education platform in which you can access more than 700 courses in different areas of study. In Engineering and Development there is the web development school that focuses on Full Stack web development with HTML, CSS and JavaScript, also mastering tools such as React, Vue, Angular and backend development with Node.js.

This career aims to train students capable of developing, integrating and managing information and communication technologies that contribute to productivity and the achievement of the strategic objectives of organizations in a globalized environment.

In Kumon, a high level of academic ability as well as the ability to self-teach is simultaneously promoted with the math worksheets which will increase in level as the student progresses. This program consists of essential elements ranging from basic operations, basic algebra and trigonometry to advanced differential and integral calculus.

experience.jobDescription: I developed a system that creates, reads, updates and deletes data from a database in order to make it easier for the institute's students to pay for their services and for the administrative staff to control the payments for services that are made daily at the school. For the programming logic I used the Laravel 6 PHP framework, Postgresql as the database and Heroku to deploy the website.

I participated in a contest that has 3 challenges; develop a video game from start to finish using basic web development tools, the compressed folder should have a maximum size of 13 kilobytes and finally finish the project in 30 days. To carry out the challenge, I applied for the first time my knowledge in HTML, Javascript and CSS to give structure, functionality and styles to the game. In order not to exceed the maximum size, the project went through a minification process using Webpack.
experience.jobTitle: Participant As A Video Game Web Developer

experience.jobDescription: After being a student at kumon, I was invited to be a teaching assistant to guide other students on their path to self-taught math learning. My main activities over the years were to supervise that the students' work is adequate, grade the work material done by the students, insightfully resolve student doubts, initial training for new students and the distribution of the work material.
